#summary The Plan for Fox Dash 2.

= Introduction =
Below should summarize the plan of attack for Fox Dash 2. Including important dates, goals, and any other important details.

= Description =
Description of the game.

== Mechanics ==
The screen will scroll from left to right depending on the orientation of the device. The fox will run continuously and jump when a finger touches the screen.

== Bad Guys ==
  * Black smoke (give it a name?)
  * Bad pickups that slow you down
== Good Guys ==
Level ups
  * stars much like the first game
  * additional pickups that make you go faster
